snippet.title: In Nightmare - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
In Nightmare is available for purchase now on PS5/PS4! Order the game here: https://store.maximumgames.com/products/in-nightmare

Enter a chilling dreamworld of whimsy and horror as you experience the story of a young child escaping his harsh reality and entering a nightmare. Players will solve puzzles as they engage in a dangerous cat-and-mouse game with the horrors that seek to trap you in the nightmare. 
 
Learn more here: http://maximumgames.com/in-nightmare  
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/maximumgames  
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialMaximumGames/
